EmailTemplate.name: RE: Note from Gary Bettger (1389021028.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Note from Gary Bettger (1389021028.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Gary, Will do and thanks for sending Sandy our way! Sandy, I see that you have already booked a time at 5pm for this coming Wednesday, thank you for scheduling. In the meantime, you can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Best,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEManager, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com From: Gary Bettger [mailto:bettger.gary@gmail.com] Sent: Saturday, January 04, 2014 10:06 PM To: Sara Conde; Sandra Bettger Subject: Note from Gary Bettger Hi Sara, happy new year! Hope you are well. Just wanted to alert you that my ex-spouse, Sandy Bettger, is in the process of contacting you to get more info on MBO as she is contemplating the independent approach (currently working as a senior proposal manager for VMD Systems in Reston). She would be a good add to the "MBO stable" so please give her the in-depth tour of how MBO works (which I know you will do anyway). Thanks in advance. Gary
